title: 10 most rib-tickling reviews on Amazon and Flipkart
text:
Flipboard 
Amazon and Flipkart are great places to shop. But, they are also great places to go if you are just in a mood to laugh. With internet, people are getting a bigger platform to express their creativity. Sometimes, this creativity is is in the form of jokes, memes, trolls or just some insanely hilarious reviews and takes on different things. If ever you start wondering, does wit and sense of humour still exist? Just go and check out the reviews on Amazon and Flipkart. Some of them are so funny that you can rest assured, you will not be disappointed. 
Check out the compilation of 10 of the most hilarious Amazon and Flipkart reviews ever. 
1,2 and 3. These Sennheiser headphones cost a bomb (priced only Rs. 84,900) and the reviews written for this product are quite hilarious and popular. 
4. A banana slicer that saved someone's marriage. 
5. Yet another headphones that are so costly that they bring out the spiritual side of a person. 
6. It is unbelievable that people can also get creative about Uranium ore. 
7. iPhone being expensive and pricey has always been a long-going debate. Here is yet another take on this. 
8. Who has not made fun of Chetan Bhagat books? But this man got technical, asked a simple question and it was altogether another story. 
9. 'How to Avoid Huge Ships' is the name of the book. And from the looks of the reviews, it has attracted a lot of attention because who doesn't have face a 'huge ship' problem daily. 
10. Though, this watch is expensive but there was a good offer going on. Now, how can anyone resist a good deal? 
Were these not some really hilarious reviews? Next time, you need a laughter therapy. Just go to Amazon or Flipkart and check out their review section.
